name: The Loop: Ouroboros
description:
The Loop: Ouroboros is a "PT Styled" Indie Horror Game. You need to investigate the mysterious death of a family that used to live in a creepy house in the mountains. By the time you enter the house you realize that something is wrong and something dark is watching you. Every step you take is different and you need to "break" the loop to get free. #adventure #horror #PTfangame #puzzle

CONTROLS:

Use : Left Click

Jump : Space

Alternative Use : Right Click

Run : Left Shift

Crouch : Left Ctrl

Flashlight : F or 1

Flashlight Focus : Z

Lighter : V or 2

Inventory : Tab

Rotate Object Inspect : R

Throw Object : T

Menu : M or Escape

This is a solo project created by me. This is my first game and I hope you enjoy it. I would love some feedback too. I have started that project a month ago.
